name: Roasted Spiced Pecan Nuts

instructions.action: In a large bowl, mix olive oil with all spices (paprika, cumin, cayenne, garlic powder, salt, pepper)
Add brown sugar if making sweet-spicy version
Add pecan nuts and toss until evenly coated
Spread nuts in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper
Roast for 12-15 minutes, stirring halfway through
Remove when fragrant and golden (watch carefully to avoid burning)
Let cool completely before storing - they'll crisp up as they cool

tips: Watch closely in the last few minutes to prevent burning
Nuts will continue to cook slightly after removing from oven
Store in airtight container for up to 2 weeks
Great for salads, snacking, or as party appetizers
For sweeter version, increase brown sugar to 3 tbsp
For more heat, add extra cayenne pepper
